cnd10:2.2: Ekoti puggalo va me dutiyo natthi, dhammo va me dutiyo natthi, yam va puggalam nissaya dhammam va nissaya mahantam kamogham bhavogham ditthogham avijjogham tareyyam uttareyyam patareyyam samatikkameyyam vitivatteyyanti.
cnd10:2.5: Atha va addho mahaddhano dhanavatipi sakko.
cnd10:2.7: saddhadhanam siladhanam hiridhanam ottappadhanam sutadhanam cagadhanam pannadhanam satipatthanadhanam …pe…
cnd10:2.9: Imehi anekehi dhanaratanehi addho mahaddhano dhanavatipi sakko.
cnd10:2.10: Atha va sakko pahu visavi alamatto suro viro vikkanto abhiru achambhi anutrasi apalayi pahinabhayabheravo vigatalomahamsotipi sakkoti—
cnd10:4.2: Anissitoti puggalam va anissito dhammam va anissito no visahami na ussahami na sakkomi na patibalo mahantam kamogham bhavogham ditthogham avijjogham taritum uttaritum pataritum samatikkamitum vitivattitunti—
cnd10:5.1: Arammanam bruhi samantacakkhuti arammanam alambanam nissayam upanissayam bruhi acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehi.
cnd10:5.3: Bhagava tena sabbannutananena upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannagato.
cnd10:8.2: Yam nissitoti yam puggalam va nissito dhammam va nissito mahantam kamogham bhavogham ditthogham avijjogham tareyyam uttareyyam patareyyam samatikkameyyam vitivatteyyanti—
cnd10:11.1: Akincannam pekkhamano satimati so brahmano pakatiya akincannayatanasamapattim labhiyeva nissayam na janati—
cnd10:11.3: Tassa bhagava nissayanca acikkhati uttarinca niyyanapatham.
cnd10:11.4: Akincannayatanasamapattim sato samapajjitva tato vutthahitva tattha jate cittacetasike dhamme aniccato pekkhamano, dukkhato …pe…
cnd10:11.45: nissaranato pekkhamano dakkhamano olokayamano nijjhayamano upaparikkhamano.
cnd10:12.3: Imaya satiya upeto hoti …pe… samannagato, so vuccati satimati—
cnd10:14.1: Natthiti nissaya tarassu oghanti natthi kinciti akincannayatanasamapatti.
cnd10:14.3: Vinnanancayatanasamapattim sato samapajjitva tato vutthahitva tanneva vinnanam abhaveti, vibhaveti, antaradhapeti, natthi kinciti passati.
cnd10:14.4: Tankarana natthi kinciti akincannayatanasamapattim nissaya upanissaya alambanam karitva kamogham bhavogham ditthogham avijjogham tarassu uttarassu patarassu samatikkamassu vitivattassuti—
cnd10:15.6: Kame pahayati vatthukame parijanitva kilesakame pahaya pajahitva vinodetva byantikaritva anabhavam gametvati—
cnd10:15.9: Dukkhe kankha …pe… chambhitattam cittassa manovilekho kathankathaya arato virato pativirato nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
cnd10:15.11: atha va dvattimsaya tiracchanakathaya arato virato pativirato nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti evampi virato kathahiti—
cnd10:16.5: Rattinca diva ca tanhakkhayam ragakkhayam dosakkhayam mohakkhayam gatikkhayam upapattikkhayam patisandhikkhayam bhavakkhayam samsarakkhayam vattakkhayam passa abhipassa dakkha olokaya nijjhaya upaparikkhati—
cnd10:19.2: Sabbesuti sabbena sabbam sabbatha sabbam asesam nissesam pariyadiyanavacanametam sabbesuti.
cnd10:19.8: Sabbesu kamesu yo vitarago vigatarago cattarago vantarago muttarago pahinarago patinissattharago vikkhambhanatoti—
cnd10:21.2: Hetthima cha samapattiyo hitva cajitva pariccajitva atikkamitva samatikkamitva vitivattitva akincannayatanasamapattim nissito allino upagato samupagato ajjhosito adhimuttoti—
cnd10:22.2: Tasam sannasamapattinam akincannayatanasamapattivimokkho aggo ca settho ca visettho ca pamokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca, parame agge setthe visetthe pamokkhe uttame pavare adhimuttivimokkhena adhimutto tatradhimutto tadadhimutto taccarito tabbahulo taggaruko tanninno tappono tappabbharo tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyoti—
cnd10:23.2: Titthe nuti samsayapuccha vimatipuccha dvelhakapuccha anekamsapuccha, “evam nu kho, nanu kho, kim nu kho, katham nu kho”ti—
cnd10:23.6: Atha va arajjamano adussamano amuyhamano akilissamanoti—
cnd10:26.2: Sabbesuti sabbena sabbam sabbatha sabbam asesam nissesam pariyadiyanavacanametam sabbesuti.
cnd10:26.7: Sabbesu kamesu yo vitaragoti sabbesu kamesu yo vitarago …pe…
cnd10:28.2: Hetthima cha samapattiyo hitva cajitva pariccajitva atikkamitva samatikkamitva vitivattitva akincannayatanasamapattim nissito allino upagato samupagato ajjhosito adhimuttoti—
cnd10:29.2: Tasam sannasamapattinam akincannayatanasamapattivimokkho aggo ca settho ca visettho ca pamokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca, parame agge setthe visetthe pamokkhe uttame pavare adhimuttivimokkhena adhimutto tatradhimutto tadadhimutto …pe…
cnd10:30.5: Atha va arajjamano adussamano amuyhamano akilissamanoti—
cnd10:33.1: Titthe ce so tattha ananuyayiti sace so tittheyya satthikappasahassani.
cnd10:33.4: Atha va arajjamano adussamano amuyhamano akilissamanoti—
cnd10:34.2: Pugampi vassaniti pugampi vassani bahuni vassani bahuni vassasatani bahuni vassasahassani bahuni vassasatasahassani bahuni kappani bahuni kappasatani bahuni kappasahassani bahuni kappasatasahassani.
cnd10:35.1: Tattheva so sitisiya vimutto, cavetha vinnanam tathavidhassati tattheva so sitibhavamanuppatto nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo sassatisamam tatheva tittheyya.
cnd10:35.2: Atha va tassa vinnanam caveyya ucchijjeyya nasseyya vinasseyya na bhaveyyati punabbhavapatisandhivinnanam nibbatteyya kamadhatuya va rupadhatuya va arupadhatuya vati akincannayatanam samapannassa sassatanca ucchedanca pucchati.
cnd10:35.4: Atha va tassa vinnanam caveyya puna patisandhivinnanam nibbatteyya kamadhatuya va rupadhatuya va arupadhatuya vati, akincannayatanam upapannassa parinibbananca patisandhinca pucchati.
cnd10:35.5: Tathavidhassati tathavidhassa tadisassa tassanthitassa tappakarassa tappatibhagassa akincannayatanam upapannassati—
cnd10:35.6: tattheva so sitisiya vimutto, cavetha vinnanam tathavidhassa.
cnd10:38.1: Acci yatha vatavegena khittati acci vuccati jalasikha.
cnd10:38.2: Vatati puratthima vata pacchima vata uttara vata dakkhina vata saraja vata araja vata sita vata unha vata paritta vata adhimatta vata verambhavata pakkhavata supannavata talapannavata vidhupanavata.
cnd10:38.3: Vatavegena khittati vatavegena khitta ukkhitta nunna panunna khambhita vikkhambhitati—
cnd10:39.2: Attham paletiti attham paleti, attham gameti, attham gacchati nirujjhati vupasamati patippassambhati.
cnd10:39.3: Na upeti sankhanti sankham na upeti, uddesam na upeti, gananam na upeti, pannattim na upeti, “puratthimam va disam gata, pacchimam va disam gata, uttaram va disam gata, dakkhinam va disam gata uddham va gata, adho va gata, tiriyam va gata, vidisam va gata”ti, so hetu natthi, paccayo natthi, karanam natthi, yena sankham gaccheyyati—
cnd10:40.3: Muniti monam vuccati nanam …pe… sangajalamaticca so muni.
cnd10:40.4: Namakaya vimuttoti so muni pakatiya pubbeva rupakaya vimutto.
cnd10:40.6: Tassa munino bhavantam agamma cattaro ariyamagga patiladdha honti.
cnd10:40.7: Catunnam ariyamagganam patiladdhatta namakayo ca rupakayo ca parinnata honti.
cnd10:40.8: Namakayassa ca rupakayassa ca parinnatatta namakaya ca rupakaya ca mutto vimutto suvimutto accantaanupadavimokkhenati—
cnd10:41.3: Na upeti sankhanti anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbuto sankham na upeti, uddesam na upeti, gananam na upeti, pannattim na upeti—
cnd10:41.4: khattiyoti va brahmanoti va vessoti va suddoti va gahatthoti va pabbajitoti va devoti va manussoti va rupiti va arupiti va sanniti va asanniti va nevasanninasanniti va.
cnd10:41.5: So hetu natthi paccayo natthi karanam natthi yena sankham gaccheyyati—
cnd10:44.1: Atthangato so uda va so natthiti so atthangato udahu natthi so niruddho ucchinno vinatthoti—
cnd10:44.2: atthangato so uda va so natthi.
cnd10:45.1: Udahu ve sassatiya arogoti udahu nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo sassatisamam tatheva tittheyyati—
cnd10:46.2: Tanti yam pucchami yam yacami yam ajjhesami yam pasademi.
cnd10:46.3: Muniti monam vuccati nanam …pe… sangajalamaticca so muni.
cnd10:46.4: Sadhu viyakarohiti sadhu acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
cnd10:47.1: Tatha hi te vidito esa dhammoti tatha hi te vidito tulito tirito vibhuto vibhavito esa dhammoti—
cnd10:47.2: tatha hi te vidito esa dhammo.
cnd10:48.4: Tatha hi te vidito esa dhammo”ti.
cnd10:50.1: Atthangatassa na pamanamatthiti atthangatassa anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbutassa rupapamanam natthi, vedanapamanam natthi, sannapamanam natthi, sankharapamanam natthi, vinnanapamanam natthi, na atthi na samvijjati nupalabbhati pahinam samucchinnam vupasantam patippassaddham abhabbuppattikam nanaggina daddhanti—
cnd10:50.3: Upasivati bhagavati upasivati bhagava tam brahmanam namena alapati.
cnd10:51.1: Yena nam vajjum tam tassa natthiti yena tam ragena vadeyyum, yena dosena vadeyyum, yena mohena vadeyyum, yena manena vadeyyum, yaya ditthiya vadeyyum, yena uddhaccena vadeyyum, yaya vicikicchaya vadeyyum, yehi anusayehi vadeyyum—
cnd10:51.2: rattoti va dutthoti va mulhoti va vinibaddhoti va paramatthoti va vikkhepagatoti va anitthangatoti va thamagatoti va, te abhisankhara pahina.
cnd10:51.3: Abhisankharanam pahinatta gatiya yena tam vadeyyum—
cnd10:51.4: nerayikoti va tiracchanayonikoti va pettivisayikoti va manussoti va devoti va rupiti va arupiti va sanniti va asanniti va nevasanninasanniti va, so hetu natthi paccayo natthi karanam natthi yena vadeyyum katheyyum bhaneyyum dipeyyum vohareyyunti—
cnd10:51.5: yena nam vajjum tam tassa natthi.
cnd10:52.1: Sabbesu dhammesu samuhatesuti sabbesu dhammesu sabbesu khandhesu sabbesu ayatanesu sabbasu dhatusu sabbasu gatisu sabbasu upapattisu sabbasu patisandhisu sabbesu bhavesu sabbesu samsaresu sabbesu vattesu uhatesu samuhatesu uddhatesu samuddhatesu uppatitesu samuppatitesu pahinesu samucchinnesu vupasantesu patippassaddhesu abhabbuppattikesu nanaggina daddhesuti—
cnd10:53.1: Samuhata vadapathapi sabbeti vadapatha vuccanti kilesa ca khandha ca abhisankhara ca.
cnd10:53.2: Tassa vada ca vadapatha ca adhivacanani ca adhivacanapatha ca nirutti ca niruttipatha ca pannatti ca pannattipatha ca uhata samuhata uddhata samuddhata uppatita samuppatita pahina samucchinna vupasanta patippassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
cnd10:54.3: Yena nam vajjum tam tassa natthi;
cnd10:55.1: Saha gathapariyosana ye te brahmanena saddhim …pe…
